EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 2 Awareness
EmailTemplate.subject: Digital transformation. Don’t worry, you’ve got this.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Video
Session border controllers protect business communications Enterprises are getting ready for digital transformation. And your company’s communications network is a key enabler in that journey. But as your infrastructure moves from traditional telephone lines to IP packet-based services, a few challenges emerge:
- How do you guarantee quality of service for voice and video calls based on best-effort packet delivery?
- Can the media routing in your network be optimized to give customers the best possible experience? - How do you protect against denial of service attacks and malicious or fraudulent access attempts at your network borders?
Watch our new video to find out. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Digital Networks Marketing, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
